Portfolio.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
Portfolio.description: Welcome to my creative portfolio! I'm pleased to share with you a sampling of my work, accomplishments and passions throughout my career as a programmer. In these pages you will find a collection of projects that represent my commitment to excellence, creativity, and dedication every step of the way.

About.about1: Academlo student in Full Stack development, passionate about programming and problem solving. I possess skills in leadership and teamwork that I have applied during my development as a student. My knowledge base is focused on JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React and Node.js. I also possess some knowledge in design, which has allowed me to improve my projects. I have a solid Front-End proficiency, but my goal is to continue to improve my skills through new projects.
About.about2: Valuing punctuality and responsibility, I strive to maintain a committed attitude towards the projects I develop. I appreciate hearing diverse opinions, as they contribute to the enrichment of my work and professional development.

projects.description: Apparel e-commerce design with API. Cart, dark mode and product details for a complete and enhanced shopping experience. Seeks to clearly show the user each product.

galletica.subtitle: play fortune cookie
galletica.description: Website 'Galletica de la Fortuna': Virtual simulation of opening fortune cookies with inspirational messages and online tips. Interactive and entertaining experience. Using a JSON that provides the phrases, with background change.

climatic.subtitle: climate application
climatic.description: Weather app with global API   offering search by location, dark mode, °C to °F conversion and details such as pressure, clouds and wind. Displays temperature and cloud status.

RandM.subtitle: rick and morty characters.
RandM.description: This application uses the API to search for characters in different dimensions. It allows you to enter a dimension number or search randomly using a button.

User.subtitle: User creation page
User.description: Web page design to create users with the API. It employs CRUD method, presenting data form and informative modalities in each process, the application has dark mode.

poke.subtitle: Application that shows the pokemon
poke.description: The page displays the pokemon using the API  which we can do different types of filtering, using the paths that allow access to detailed information of each pokemon contains a filter by name and by type.

tecn.subtitle: ecommerce of technology products
tecn.description: Ecommerce application with API integration  Displays and filters technology products by price and type. Includes user registration, shopping cart and purchase history.
